entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023
